author: Chris Scullion
title: Sony CFO says its live service shift is ‘not entirely going smoothly’ but pledges to carry on and learn from mistakes - Video Games Chronicle
description: Lin Tao says progress has been made despite "somewhat negative news" caused by Concord and Marathon
content:

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
title: Battlefield 6 Open Beta Forces PC Gamers to Mess About With Their BIOS to Enable Secure Boot — and Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Is Next - IGN
description: If you’re trying to play the Battlefield 6 Open Beta on PC, you might have run into a problem: ‘Secure Boot is not enabled.’ You're not alone.
content:
If youre trying to play the Battlefield 6 Open Beta on PC, you might have run into a problem: Secure Boot is not enabled.

author: Chris Scullion
title: Sony CFO says Marathon is expected to release before March, and Bungie’s independence is ‘getting lighter’ - Video Games Chronicle
description: "We are now fixing the problems, so we believe this launch will happen"
content:
Sony’s chief financial officer has said she expects Marathon to release by the end of March 2026.
In a Q&A session following the company’s latest financial results, Sony‘s execs were asked about… [+2477 chars]

author: Sergiu Gatlan
title: Microsoft warns of high-severity flaw in hybrid Exchange deployments - BleepingComputer
description: Microsoft has warned customers to mitigate a high-severity vulnerability in Exchange Server hybrid deployments that could allow attackers to escalate privileges in Exchange Online cloud environments undetected.
